Greetings to Polish Prime Minister
    Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a congratulatory message to Marek Belka on his appointment as prime minister of Poland.
 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms in the future in conformity with the aspiration and interests of their peoples, the message sincerely wished him success in his responsible work.    
 Meanwhile, Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a congratulatory message to Wlodzimierz Cimoszewicz on his reappointment as Polish foreign minister.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Journalists' Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to President Kim Il Sung from Chinese Journalists' Delegation
    Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- A gift was presented to President Kim Il Sung by a delegation of the All-China Journalists Association on a visit to the DPRK.
 The gift was handed over to an official concerned by Lu Baokang, director of the All-China Journalists Association who is leading its delegation.
